app_description.message: Private bookmark storage. Save and protect links with a password — only you can see them.

app_password_warning.message: ⚠️ Important: If you forget your password, it cannot be recovered. All data is stored only on this device and cannot be accessed without the correct password.

app_instruction_title.message: 🔐 How to use Private Bookmark Locker

app_instruction_save.message: To save a bookmark, click the 💾 button in the header.

app_instruction_lock.message: To lock bookmarks, click the 🔒 icon in the header.

app_instruction_view_basic.message: To view regular bookmarks, click the 👁️ icon in the header.

app_instruction_view_incognito.message: To view incognito bookmarks, click the 🕶️ icon in the header.

app_instruction_create_folder.message: To create a folder, click the 📁 button in the header.

app_instruction_incognito_hint.message: To use the extension in incognito mode, right-click the icon, choose 'Manage extension', and enable 'Allow in incognito'.

app_instruction_panic.message: To set a panic button and use it, go to chrome settings and assign a shortcut to close all tabs and save them in a folder.

app_pass_short_error.message: Password must be at least 4 characters long

app_import_modal_description.message: Drag & drop your file here or click to select

app_export_modal_description.message: Click the button below to export your bookmarks as a file. You cansave it and import later if needed.

app_panic_description.message: Set panic button (default = alt+p) to close all tabs and save them in folder

app_ads_title.message: Automatically add and manage AI prompts
